alert.note: Alert for Gillespie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 05 at 4:31PM CDT until May 08 at 10:50AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BLANCO AND NORTHEASTERN GILLESPIE COUNTIES... At 430 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Willow City, or 16 miles northeast of Fredericksburg, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Round Mountain, Eckert, Sandy, Crabapple, Willow City and Blowout. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for south central Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
